arts.ttl: Biereth scores again as Monaco beats Angers to move into third place in Ligue 1
arts.sum: After being eliminated from the last 16 of the Champions League in midweek, fifth-placed Lille lost 1-0 at Nantes despite having an extra player for the closing stages. The defeat could prove costly in the race for a Champions League spot, as Lille would drop to sixth if Lyon beats struggling Le Havre at home on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Ligue 1 predictions including Angers vs. Monaco
